name: Mateo's delirium
description:
Mateo and his cousin Rodrick are competing to see who is the fastest constructor. Your job is to fix the most bricks you can in only 60 seconds.

This is a local multiplayer game in wich you play against your partner in an speed game to fix broken bricks.

Will you be able to achive Mateo's delirium?

SOCIAL NETWORKS

YOUTUBE:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCA9DMaT1r_Rd1w8Lq30wpEg

DISCORD:https://discord.gg/w98kCN8Quf
